title: Creative Writing and Drawing

vocab.definition: Using your imagination to make something new
A picture that goes with a story
A person or animal in a story
Where and when a story takes place

teachingNotes: Encourage invented spelling for creativity. Let students draw first, then write. Share and celebrate student work.
